name: brsh
description: A unix like shell written in javascript

scripts.build: npm run build:shell && npm run build:terminal
scripts.build:shell: browserify ./index.js --standalone Shell -d -p bundle-collapser/plugin -p common-shakeify -g uglifyify | exorcist dist/shell.min.js.map > dist/shell.min.js
scripts.build:terminal: browserify ./lib/terminal -x Shell -t browserify-shim --standalone Terminal -d -p bundle-collapser/plugin -p common-shakeify -g uglifyify | exorcist dist/terminal.min.js.map > dist/terminal.min.js

author: Eliot Stocker
